rows.name:
Even monsters get tired of
chasing you eventually...

Make sure to put away your weapon
if you're gonna run away!

I've heard that defeated monsters
drop money and items!

Don't they also drop HP Potions when
you Topple them and stuff?

Did you know Driver Arts can
have extra effects sometimes?

First you gotta Break the enemy!
Then you can Topple 'em!

I see, I see...
And what does that do?

Toppled foes are easy targets.
You won't miss a single attack!

Driver Combos won't always work
against some enemies... And some other
ones are completely immune!

Wow... They must be pretty
tough cookies.

'Course, we don't have to worry about
that since we're not Drivers!

If you approach a monster from behind,
it won't even notice you're there!

Um, they're not ALL that oblivious.
I should know - I tried to sneak up
on a wily one the other day!

And it actually spotted you? Huh...
I guess you can never be too careful.

Some enemies will only block
attacks from certain directions,
like the front or the side.

I heard there are some monsters
that'll power up their allies!

Sounds like a pain. Probably best
to take those ones out first!

Traveling to Aurium is big pain
in bum-bum. If only could take
break at Bern on way!

Traveling to Aurium much easier
these days! Can rest up at Bern
before last leg of journey!

Me heard it was Laura-sama that chased off
nasty Gogols at Bern! Many thanks!

It's such a pain trying to work when
the lanternâ€™s broken...

Yeah, I wish someone would
fix that thing up already.

The lantern's back in working order!
Ah, it's so much easier to work
with a little illumination.

Yeah, I heard some guy called
Chalcedony organized the repairs.
We owe that dude big time!

Did you hear? Apparently it was
a Knight of Iira, Laura-sama herself,
who fixed up the lanterns!

Yeah, it sounds like she's been
busy all over the place...

Meh-meh... Cloth merchant Obibi
seem down in the dumps lately...

Probably because she not popular
with Nopon customers. Must be
big struggle to make money!

This hat so stylish!
No wonder it all the rage!
Obibi seem much happier lately too!

Me heard stylish hat was actually idea
of recently knighted Laura lady.

Wowee! Knight and fashion guru...
So multi-talented!

That handyman Gio is pretty incredible.
He'll take on any task at no charge!

Really? Wow. Maybe I'll hit him up
next time I need a helping hand.

That handyman, Gio, he's great and all,
but he's kind of old hat. It's all about
Laura-sama nowadays.

And how! She and Lord Adel are
always ready to offer a helping hand
to anyone in need!

It can't be easy to help out so many
people. I could never do it myself!

So Brogyn and his crew brought
all this food from the capital, eh?

That's right - apparently Master Adel
organized the whole thing!

Well I never! That man really is
the kindest in all the realm.

The city of Aurium is always
such a peaceful place.

I would hate to have to leave
this fine city behind...

True enough. I only hope we can find
safe shelter within the city bounds...

I hear a shelter has been built
beneath Spefan Inn! Now we should
all be safe.

And it's all thanks to Laura-sama!
We owe her so much.

You'd best get those materials
delivered posthaste, or you'll be
in for an earful from Wayton!

Aren't you going to evacuate
along with everyone else?

Evacuate? Me? Hah!
I don't care if every other coward
abandons this place, I'm not budging!

I hear young Aquin built a fine Divine Beast
vessel! Now we can easily evacuate
when things get rough!

Uh, weren't you saying you wouldn't
budge even if everyone else left?

Well, yes...but Laura-sama and Lord
Adel personally supported this effort.
Who am I to turn down their goodwill?
...Well, I'm glad you came around.

Why can't we play in the gardens
any more? This is no fun...

Oh! Laura-sama!
Thank you for fixing up the gardens!

The view from here is immaculate,
don't you think?

Sure, but, uh...should you even be here?
Don't you have work to do?

I'll have you know, inspecting the view
is a very important part of my job!

It's so wonderful to be able to look out
upon this view once again.

Indeed - and all thanks to the hard
work of Bry and Kaym.
This place is like paradise...

That's all down to Bry the gardener.
He's a talented one, all right!

This used to be such a
beautiful garden...
That Aegis has a lot to answer for.

It's so good to see Sachsum Gardens
looking beautiful again.

Well, with Laura-sama and Lord Adel
on the job, it was only a matter of time!

...Why do YOU look so proud of
THEIR good work?

Remember, stay out of the alleyways.
You can run into some real shady
Nopon back there.

I know! My mum's always telling
me to watch out for them.

Those Nopon in the back alleys are
hardcore criminals. They throw litter
on the streets and stuff!

Yeah, my mum told me all about it...
I'd be so scared if I ever ran into them!

Hey, I heard nobody's seen those
dodgy Nopon in the alleyways lately.

Awesome! We can finally go play
hide and seek back there!

W-wow, playing in the back alleys?
That sounds so...rebellious!

I love Iiran Trout.
It's tasty AND cheap!

That's 'cause they breed them so
efficiently. I prefer the taste of
Amber Sweetfish myself, though.

I heard the farm's whole shoal
of Iiran Trout was wiped out
in the attack...

Oh, how awful... D'you think that
means we'll be seeing price hikes?

Thanks to Laura-sama and Lord Adel,
the fish farm is up and running again!

Well, that's a relief! I thought Tyler's
whole business was going to go under.

Terribly sorry, but we're all out
of Armus right now.
Dear me, that's quite the pickle...

The Armus came back! Young Joey
sorted everything out, the fine lad!

Well, that's good to hear.
I'd never be able to deliver my
luggage without them!

Where's Formide Shopping Ward
again? I need to buy some accessories...

Right behind you, you numpty!
Honestly, I swear you could get lost
in your own living room...

D'you think we should get out of the
capital? I mean, what if the Aegis
comes back for more...?

Don't worry, I'm sure Lord Adel
can handle that nasty Aegis.

Apparently we're all going to
be able to evacuate on that
Divine Beast ship Aquin built!

Well, isn't that nice for you!
Not that I'm going anywhere.
What?! Please, you have to come too!
Me want to be more fashionable!

Meh, no use standing round
and complain. Best go down
to Formide Shopping Ward.
This hat is pinnacle of fashion!
Shop of Obibi seem very popular lately!

Today's the day we settle this, bro.
Once and for all!
We'll see!

You can do it, big bro!
Don't give up, other big bro!

Those brothers are always going at it,
day in, day out... Don't they ever get
bored of this nonsense?

When the town was under attack,
you turned tail and ran away!
You're such an embarrassment!

Grrr...
I... I know...
Hey, I thought I saw you running too!

Only Prince Adel's lot had the guts
to stand and fight!

C'mon, can we please stop bickering?
We should be joining forces,
like brothers are meant to do!

Guess you've got a point...
Yeah, OK! Let's join forces,
and kick that Aegis's butt!

You guys...don't you think that's
kind of dangerous?!

Nah, we'll be fine! Besides, this is the
perfect spot for keeping lookout!

Laura-sama! You chased off those Gogols
at the main gate, didn't you?

I was only watching from a distance,
but you looked so...gallant!

I know, right?! Man, I'd love to become
a Driver too someday!

Laura-sama! You're going to defeat that
nasty Aegis for us, right?!

I hope you know we're all
cheering you on!

A Gulan and an Invidian? That's an
unusual pairing if ever I saw one.

Ah, the sweet sound of
Torigonda music...
It's a great performance to be sure!
They're just the coolest!

I'm so glad these guys were around
when the Aegis attacked.

The resounding tones of the
Iiran Viella gave us courage
when all seemed lost!

Don't you think Leo's been playing
his Iiran Viella with a renewed
vigour lately?
I heard he had a spot of good fortune.

With the addition of Rikoko's flute,
these performances have become
more remarkable than ever.

Yes, that young Nopon really brings
a certain...gleeful energy to the mix!
Laura-samaaa!

Sorry about her, Laura-sama.
She really looks up to you, you know.

Laura-sama! After you defeat the Aegis,
I hope you'll regale us with tales of
your gallant efforts!

My lieges... Though I am but an old
man, I humbly beg of you to protect
our future, for this child's sake.
Oh! It's Laura-sama!
I see Lord Adel and Lord Hugo, too!
Me go play with friends!

Are things really going to be OK?
Do you think we'll really survive...?
I...it'll be fine!

Yes-yes! Friends beat up nasty
people like bish-bash-bosh!

Roll up, roll up!
Get your steaming-hot buns here!

Ah, Lord Adel!
Would you care for a taste?

Laura-sama! Would you and your friends
care for a bite to eat?

Lord Shin, you simply must share one of
your famous recipes with me!

Oh, whichever should I buy?
Choosing accessories is so hard...
How about a Promise Ring?

If only I had stronger accessories,
I could've beaten up that Aegis's
minions no problem...

Um, I don't think accessories make
THAT much difference. You'd need
stronger weapons and Blades too.

I must equip the very best accessories
to keep myself well-protected...

Are you sure you want to buy them
here, then? It might be better to defeat
enemies and get them that way...

Aww, they haven't got any
Platinum Shrooms...

Those things aren't easy to get hold of.
With their divine scent and incredible
texture, it's no wonder they're a rarity.

If you're ever in a bind, you're more
likely to find good help from Gio or
Laura than from the army.

They're lifesavers, for sure. But we
can't just rely on them for everything!

True enough. Sometimes you've gotta
sort out your own problems!

Hey...what do you think's going to
happen to Iira now?

It's difficult to say...
But I think we should trust in Lord
Adel. He'll find a way, I know it.
This inn's so lovely, isn't it?

Yes, the atmosphere here is so different
from back home. Very relaxing.

D'you reckon we ought to think
about heading back home?

I doubt we could do that even if
we wanted to. All the Divine Beast ships
are fully booked lately.
Wow, that's pretty awkward...

Well, we never did manage to
catch a ship back home.
But maybe that's for the best.

Yeah, I have grown pretty fond of
this place. And I'm sure that wonderful
prince will sort everything out!
You need to focus more!

At this rate, the Aegis's Artifices will
make short work of you!

We're going to protect Iira's future
with our own hands!

Let's go eat some of CafÃ© Amicus's
famous specialty!
Really? I'm not that hungry yet...
We should probably head home soon.

I don't want to be in a confined space!
It makes me scared those things will
come back and I'll be trapped inside!

Now, once Lord Adel and the others
start fighting, you run to the inn and
hide on the lower level, OK?

D'you think it'll hold up?
I'm a bit scared...

Haven't you been reading long enough?
Let's do something else already!

Sure, once I get to the end of the
Tale of Blue Barney...

C'mon, cheer up. I know all that
ruckus was scary, but we can't let
it break our spirits!

I'm researching the legend of Eden.
It might hold some hints as to why
this place was attacked...

Let's head to Formide Shopping Ward!
I heard the chairman of the Chamber of
Commerce is giving out free food!

Let me finish jotting down all my
observations about Laura-sama first...
Is this the full shipment for today?

The damage wasn't too bad around
these parts. We were pretty lucky...

Gotta make sure we have plenty of
supplies to distribute, just in case
worst comes to worst...
Looks like Median Gate is still closed...

Guess we'll have to go round through
Formide Shopping Ward if we want to
reach the palace...

Have you considered joining the army?
It's a great honor to fight for Iira!

Why are you being so pushy?
The capital is at peace, do we
really need a big army?

Have you considered joining the army?
Join us and take revenge on the
brigands who attacked our fine capital!

I think I'll pass. I'm no Driver, I'd just
wind up dying a fool's death.
Have you considered joining the-

Sure, I'll lend you my strength.
I want to pitch in to do something
for my homeland.

The world's a dangerous place lately...
I heard a pack of Gogols almost
made it into the city gates!

Oh yeah, but Laura-sama drove them off,
right? She's pretty amazing...

I heard Tarres the master glassmaker
passed away...

That's awful... I don't think he ever
passed his skills on, so they might be
lost to the world forever...

Hey, did you see the glasswork
young Charlet made?

Indeed. She may not be up to Tarres's
level yet, but she's full of potential!

Hey, did you see Sarah's
new boyfriend?
Oh, yeah! Isn't he just the coolest?!
...Seriously?

I haven't seen Mireille around lately.
Do you know what she's been up to?

Apparently she got back together with
her ex-husband. They're starting up a
pottery business in Hyber Village.

Ahh, it was so good to be able to eat
Tricolor Acqua Pazza again...

All thanks to Lord Adel and
that passionate Superbian.

Me hear Lord Adel organize cooking
contest. Was very successful!

Me suggest to Chairman we organize
even bigger event in Formide Shopping
Ward. Sound like big profit opportunity!

Ah, you'll want to ask Jerry about that.
You can find him down below.

J-Jerry? Are you sure? I guess he
has mellowed out a bit lately...

Palva and Dudan were looking awfully
pleased with themselves... You don't
think they really found a stash of gold?

Oh, those two are always like that.
I'm sure their mad scheme was a dud,
just like usual.

That Palva seems to be doing awfully
well for herself lately...

Rumor has it she dug up a legendary
stash of gold in the Dannagh Desert.
I guess dreams really can come true...
That's the palace - Aureus Palace!

Wow, it's so...tall!
How many floors d'you think it's got?

So tell me...did the Chamber of
Commerce Chairman turn out to be
a rotter?

No, he was just working himself
too hard. Looks like he's going to
tone it down a little from now on.

I heard a Divine Beast visited the Shopping
Ward the other day and bought a
veritable mountain of meat and fish!

I guess with a body that big, you'd
need to have a big appetite...

Life's been tough for all of us lately,
but I'm glad things worked out for
Hedwyn at least.

I quite agree. Seeing Kai-kun and Kei-kun so
happy has brought joy to us all!

I feel so...useless right now.
When this place was attacked by
monsters, we couldn't do a thing.

If we want to contribute, we'll just
have to become incredible Drivers
like Lord Adel and Lord Hugo!

So we made it to Aletta, but we're
kind of short on manpower.

Still, Lord Adel's retainers are doing
everything they can to help. We'll just
have to work with what we've got.

Six whole new recruits! Thanks to
Lord Adel and the Lieutenant, our
manpower woes are as good as solved!

Though those four young Nopon are
more like a quarter of a recruit each.

We could learn a lot from the way Lady
Laura fights. Passing weapons between
Driver and Blade...most intriguing!

This is Lord Adel's domain,
so it's far safer here than in Invidia.

Yeah... We can finally get some
proper rest, right, Mama?

I want you to grow up nice and
strong like Laura-sama, Kasumi-sama
and Kagutsuchi-sama.

What about Hikari-sama?
Can't I be like her instead?

Ah, Lord Adel and company!
Good luck out there!

We're counting on you to bring
peace to Alst!

Should we not be accompanying
Lord Hugo as well?

We're in Iira now - they don't want
too many Superbian soldiers roaming
about. Let's just stick to our stations.

I haven't seen the Special Inquisitor
around lately...what's he up to?

Accompanying Lord Hugo, perhaps?
Personally, I'd feel safer with him back
in Superbia. He's nothing but trouble.

Word of Lord Hugo's brilliant feats
has reached far and wide!

I feel such pride. I only wish he would
allow us to accompany him!

Did we evacuate the weapon and
accessory vendors yet?

Yeah. They're both below the inn,
safe and sound.
The bridge was finally fixed...

Best not to hang about here.
Let's make haste for the capital.

We're so lucky we got out of the capital
when we did! To think it got attacked...

I know exactly what you mean...
We need to get back to Aletta.

Should... Should we leave Iira?
Is it so bad that we need to
abandon Aletta?

I don't have all the answers myself...
But I trust Lord Adel! I'm certain
he'll make everything OK!
